title: Series B Fundraising Model
summary: Built the financial narrative and operating model for a $30M raise.
description: Developed a comprehensive financial model for a B2B SaaS platform raising $30M. Included cohort analysis, LTV/CAC sensitivity, and headcount planning.

title: Supply Chain Optimization
summary: Reduced inventory overhead by 18% through predictive forecasting.
description: Analyzed SKU performance and inventory turnover for a national retailer. Recommended a dynamic reordering system that reduced working capital by 18%.

title: Buy-Side Due Diligence
summary: Commercial and financial diligence for a cross-border acquisition.
description: Led financial diligence for a $150M acquisition. Validated quality of earnings (QoE), normalized EBITDA, and identified key post-merger integration risks.

title: Cost Structure Analysis
summary: Mapped cost centers for a hospital network to identify redundancies.
description: Implemented a zero-based budgeting framework saving $2m annually.
